useCase.name: Perform Fault Management Provisioning

preconditions.precondition: Business User and Fault Management System are operational

successEndConditions.condition: Fault Management Job and Report are successfully created and completed

useCase.trigger: Business User initiates the Fault Management Provisioning process

mainSequence.step: Business User registers listeners for Fault Management Job and Report notifications with the Hub
Business User requests the creation of a Fault Management Job
Fault Management System creates the Fault Management Job
Fault Management System responds with the created Fault Management Job
Fault Management Job generates necessary data
Fault Management Job creates a Fault Management Report
Fault Management Report is marked as completed
Fault Management Job receives the completed report
Fault Management Job is marked as completed or scheduled
Business User requests the Fault Management Report
Fault Management System retrieves the Fault Management Report
Fault Management System responds with the retrieved Fault Management Report
